system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: Why music moves us
generated_text: Emotions triggered by melody & rhythm. Brain processes sound patterns, releasing dopamine & endorphins. Chemicals associated with pleasure, reward & bonding. Music taps into these systems, evoking strong emotions. Personal connections, memories & experiences tied to specific songs. Cultural & social influences shape emotional responses.
